game.name: Five Dates
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Five Dates는 예측할 수 없는 디지털 데이팅 세계에 대한 대화형 로맨틱 코미디입니다. 가능성 있는 5명의 여성과 매칭을 통해 Vinny는 물리적 접촉이 더는 불가능한 세상에서 선택 사항이 아닌 세상에서 친밀성과 이끌림, 유대감을 여전히 느낄 수 있는지를 탐색합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Five Dates is an interactive rom-com about the unpredictable world of digital dating. With five potential female matches, Vinny explores whether compatibility, chemistry and connection is still possible in a world where physical touch is no longer an option.

reviewHighlights.text: Overall a very casual little game about digital dating, I recommend playing with friends for some giggles. I helped my boy get some and you should do...
it's a mix between painfully akward and boring, i'm not sure what i was expecting
